features: INSULATED WATER BOTTLE: BJPKPK half gallon water bottle use double-walled vacuum insulation technology to keep your water cold for up to 24 hours, or hot for up to 12 hours, make sure you enjoy your favorite beverages at the most suitable temperature all day.

18/8 PREMIUM STAINLESS STEEL: Made of food-grade 18/8 stainless steel, coated with environmental anti-slip powder at the surface, fully resistant to oxidation, rust and flavor transfer, a perfect metal water bottle for your daily water drinking.

LEAK PROOF & PORTABLE: With a leak-proof silicone loop inside the lid, it prevents splashing and dripping when it's turned over or shaken. Has a carrying handle to enable you take it to gym, workout, and any outdoor recreations.

BPA FREE & IDEAL GIFT: This large water bottle insulated is 100% BPA & lead free. Perfect for traveling, hiking, cycling, camping, fishing, gym and more. With a variety of fashion colors, it is a great gift for your loved ones to help them keep hydrated and healthier.
DISHWASHER SAFE: This 64oz water bottle is easy to keep clean by hand, and it is dishwasher safe. Please wash it thoroughly with a mild dish soap and warm water before your first use.
body.description: BJPKPK Large 64oz Insulated Water Bottle, Half Gallon Water Bottle with BPA Free Handle, Leakproof Stainless Steel Sports Water Flask, Big Water Bottle, Water Jug Perfect for Fitness Hiking Camping Outdoor Sports, Grey

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BJPKPK is committed to design and produce high-quality water bottles. We hope to bring fashionable, portable, reusable and safe products to more families and continue to work in this direction.Our Water Bottles are made of 18/8 Food Grade Stainless Steel, coated with environmental anti-slip powder at the surface, fully resistant to oxidation, rust and flavor transfer, BPA and lead free, a perfect water flask for your daily water drinking.Keeping hydrated is essential for our health, this large insulated water bottle holds enough liquid to help you stay hydrated throughout the day, allows you to replenish water anytime and anywhere.

Easy to Fill Wide mouth design is convenient to add ice cube and clean. Durable Powder Coating Environmental anti-slip powder make it comfortable and safe to hold. Leakproof Designed with silicone seal inside of the cup to against leaks. Portable Handle Convenient for you to take it to any outdoor recreations. Note: Two type of lids will be shipped randomly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My tea stays hot all day!
reviews.reviewText: I love it. My tea stays hot all day. The fact that it can be put in the dishwasher it's a big plus. I have used it several times and taken it to the garden where I volunteer and even in the cold weather it has stayed hot the whole time. Have already put it through the dishwasher a few times and it's still working wonderfully. Great product. Will definitely get a couple more for myself and give some as a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice bottle - keeps liquids cool and no leaks
reviews.reviewText: Wanted a good bottle to travel with larger quantities of drinks than our water bottles could hold. So naturally it will be on it's side, rolling around, in the sun, whatever. We didn't want to worry and this bottle is perfect for that. Just a simple screw-on lid, easy handle on the top so nothing at all to break. Just what we wanted.Would be perfect for the beer types that want to buy a growler's worth from the local brewery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT deal for the $ !
reviews.reviewText: LOVE: The double wall insulation helps to keep my water cool. The LOW cost and large 1/2 gallon (64oz) capacity.NITPIK: Although the lid can seal water-tight, you need to really provide a strong twist to insure zero drops if you are going to lay the bottle on it's side.BUY AGAIN: I ABSOLUTELY would!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great bottles, avoid the slim if you struggle with lids on jars
reviews.reviewText: Ah, BJPKPK. I used to say the name out loud jokingly, but now I say it out of affection.I bought the 64oz with handle to replace my non-dishwasher-safe Coleman 1-gallon jug. The BJPKPk blows it out of the water. Better insulation, and way easier to clean. I liked it so much that I also bought the 64oz slim. The designs between slim and handle version are very different. Some notes:Slim Version:-Great in the dishwasher, no pooling water.-Simple cap that isn't likely to break.-Better form factor.-VERY difficult to get the lid off due to bottle circumference and small lid with no leverage. The only design flaw for this model. Would render the bottle unusable for many (most?) people without jamming a wooden spoon or similar in the handle for leverage.-No quick access, must take off entire lid to drink.Handle Version:-Worse in the dishwasher. Water pools in concave bottom and collects in the cap. Not a deal breaker, just need to put it on the drying rack.-Much wider body, more annoying in gym bag.-Lid has more moving parts, feels like it will eventually be the part that fails (but ok so far).-MUCH easier to remove lid. It is wider, goes over the outside of the bottle instead of screwing in, and has a bigger handle for leverage.-Has a small screw-off cap for quick access.Overall would definitely recommend. But DO NOT buy the slim if you struggle getting lids off of jars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My GF and I purchased these because we filter our water using reverse osmosis and did not want to put that clean water in a plastic container. We can fill these up and have clean drinking water for the day without plastic chemicals leaching into it. Happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This will hold water hot or cold for most of the day. I work 12hr shifts. I bought a second one because I liked it so much. Unfortunately I had knocked it off a counter and the plastic top shattered. I am currently looking for a replacement top. One of my coworkers has just ordered one as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This water jug is the perfect container. Keeps my water cold all day long. Easy to drink from and carry around. One thing is that I wish you could get a straw to go with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I wanted to like this water bottle...
reviews.reviewText: As the title states, I really wanted to like this water bottle if even to prove to my wife and daughters that you don't need to spend $50 on a Stanley.The good: it holds a lot of water. That is about it for the good.The bad: the lid just plain sucks. takes far to long to get the threads lined up just perfectly so the damn thing will screw on. I hate straws on water bottles but this lid makes me wish it had a straw or a spout. Every time you take a drink having to screw the lid back on makes me want to throw the thing against the wall.Insulation, I honestly don't think this water bottle has any. cold water turns to luke warm water in a couple of hours. Maybe because of all the time it takes to screw the lid on, letting in warm air. I added ice trying to keep the water cold for longer. I maybe got an extra couple of hours that way.For me the aggravation from the lid means the water bottle will end up at the back of the shelf with all the other forgotten mugs and glasses.Do yourself a favor and just pony up the cash for a Stanley. Your blood pressure will thank you.
Take this to work with me. It’s enough water to get me through the day. Stays cold all day.

Great size, I can fill it and it will keep me going for a full work day. Water stays cold (haven't tested it in the summer yet). I added a straw with a rubber bottom so I can still close the lid. The color is rich. I've only had a few drips from the lid when it's closed, but that doesn't bother me. Paint chips easily, especially on the bottom, but also doesn't bother me. Overall, Great bottle for the price point.
I work outside in summer. This keeps my water cool throughout the day and is very durable. Feels well made and should last me for years.
High quality. Easy to clean. Comfortable carrying handle. Beautiful colour. I could not be happier.
